about_the_game:
Return to the underground city with the brave traveler Johan. Explore a vast world, upgrade your equipment, complete hundred of new Match-3 levels and solve the last mystery of the lost city.

Usually with games of the Match-3 genre, you can look forward to a series of grids with tiles that you need to remove by creating groups. However there are exceptions and Cave Quest 3 is one such title. This game combines Adventure type activities with various forms of Match-3 game play.

Features

  • Atmospheric hand-painted locations
  • Various game modes and difficulty levels
  • Unpredictable plot twists
  • Сollect gold and valuables to buy the necessary equipment
